Uses of Interface
org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker.HttpInvokerRequestExecutor

Packages that use HttpInvokerRequestExecutor
org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker Remoting classes for transparent Java-to-Java remoting via HTTP invokers. 
 

Uses of HttpInvokerRequestExecutor in org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker
 

Classes in org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker that implement HttpInvokerRequestExecutor
 class AbstractHttpInvokerRequestExecutor
          Abstract base implementation of the HttpInvokerRequestExecutor interface.
 class CommonsHttpInvokerRequestExecutor
          HttpInvokerRequestExecutor implementation that uses Jakarta Commons HttpClient to execute POST requests.
 class SimpleHttpInvokerRequestExecutor
          HttpInvokerRequestExecutor implementation that uses J2SE facilities to execute POST requests, without support for HTTP authentication or advanced configuration options.
 

Methods in org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker that return HttpInvokerRequestExecutor
 HttpInvokerRequestExecutor HttpInvokerClientInterceptor.getHttpInvokerRequestExecutor()
          Return the HttpInvokerRequestExecutor used by this remote accessor.
 

Methods in org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker with parameters of type HttpInvokerRequestExecutor
 void HttpInvokerClientInterceptor.setHttpInvokerRequestExecutor(HttpInvokerRequestExecutor httpInvokerRequestExecutor)
          Set the HttpInvokerRequestExecutor implementation to use for executing remote invocations.
